divs: Sighting DetailsI woke up feeling slighty scared. I looked toward my open bedroom door and a human like figure stood in the doorway. It was as tall as the door and thin. I tried to wake up my girlfriend but she didn't move. It then came at me. The next thing I remember is waking up in bed in the morning with a cold sweat and some bruises which I think I got from fighting back. I was taken a few times when I was a child but my mother says I was dreaming yet I was wide awake. I know I'm not crazy and scared it might happen again. Sometimes I wake up in the morning with bruises that I did not have when I went to bed and family and my girlfriend have noticed the bruises.
Summary: It came into my room and took me
trends: There have been 45 other sightings in Grand Rapids
There were no other sightings in Grand Rapids on or around June 1st 2013
